description: The function checkPkcs12 is vulnerable to several types of attacks. The 'bufferOrPath' parameter can be manipulated to traverse the file system (CWE-22) and access sensitive files. The 'passphrase' parameter can be used to inject malicious commands (CWE-78) that will be executed by the system. The function also exposes sensitive information (CWE-200) by returning error messages that may contain details about the system or the application.
